text: Egha dughiar kamra, Josua Makedan nguibar ekiamɨn mɨdorozim gamua an atrivimɨn suiraghav a mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Egha uan gumazibav kemezɨ me nguibar kamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar moghɨra me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Ezɨ men tav ua itir puvatɨ. A Jerikon atrivim gamizir arazir kamra, a ua Makedan atrivim gami.
